front.title: IESG Overload and Quantity of WGs

abstract.t: One of the key proposals in the PACT [PACT] draft is a limit on theduration of Working Groups. The authors believe that limitations ofthat type are too constraining on IESG ability to manage working groupsand areas and that they will not be effective in practice. We proposean alternate restriction -- on the total number of working groups in anArea -- that we believe will have a number of desirable effects (asuperset of those suggested with the PACT model) and that it is morelikely to operate as intended.
